title: (x) Macworld magazine article headlines - Gotham {Yves}
content:
okay, the font in red is brody’s bonn. that was easy.

the small font used for the text may be frutiger, i suppose (too small to tell?)

but what is the one used in the headlines of the articles? has a bit of avenir but its not.

any ideas or comments

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FontSample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=FontSample.jpg) | 81.14 KB |
author: tungsten

comments.content: Had this one before I think: [Hoefler & Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Hoefler%20&%20Frere-Jones)’ inescapable [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110155947/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/gotham/index.html).
